divs: Sighting Details Traveling north on hwy 211 , we saw a row of white lights with a red flashing light beneath them. We kept driving a got within 100 feet of the object and could make out a triangular outline.We could see the lights clearly, that got our attention. I noticed these were not the standard arrangement for aircraft lights. As we passed beneath the object, we lost track of it.
Summary: Traveling north on hwy 211 , we saw a row of white lights with a red flashing light beneath them. We kept driving a got within 100 feet of the object and could make out a triangular outline.
trends: There have been no other sightings in West End
This sighting has never been favorited.
